    function ControlOnFocus(CompareString, field) {

        if (field.value == CompareString) field.value = '';

    }

    function ControlOnBlur(CompareString, field) {

        if (field.value == '') field.value = CompareString;
    }

    function isValid(id) {
        if (typeof (Page_Validators) == "undefined") return;

        $("#" + id).children('.error').each(function () {
            var Reqid = $(this).attr("id");

            $("#" + id).children(".valid").removeAttr("style");
            $("#" + id).children(".valid").css("display", "none");

            var _isValid = document.getElementById(Reqid).isvalid;

            if (_isValid) {

                $("#" + id).children(".valid").removeAttr("style");
                $("#" + id).children(".valid").css("display", "inline");
            }
            else {
                $("#" + id).children(".valid").removeAttr("style");
                $("#" + id).children(".valid").css("display", "none");
                return false;
            }
        });
    }        
</script>
